game.name: Tessel Run
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A physics-based puzzle platformer featuring hand-drawn tangram tessels, layered parallax worlds, and color that changes the rules of physics.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A physics-based puzzle platformer featuring hand-drawn tangram tessels, layered parallax worlds, and color that changes the rules of physics.
